Posts.Content: TrishCat wrote: Hello Last week was week 5 of six weeks of daily radiation. My skin has really taken a bad turn this last week. I was diagnosed with a staph infection underneath my breast and in a few spots on my chest and armpit. Has anyone dealt with this? When i heard "staph" i was pretty frightened. How long will it take to heal? Just looking for similar stories and/support. Thanks sisters! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Staph infection during radiation TrishCat MinusTwo

Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2016 12:53PM TrishCat wrote: I am just about to start week 6 of rads. I'd be so happy to answer any and all questions and share my experience. I had stage 1 IDC with one positive node, er/pr+, HER2-. No chemo. I'm on month 3 of arimidex.
Posts.Title: Starting Rads in January 2017 ElizabethAM Caligirl55
